plugins.description: v7.25.0 - Task metrics, debug mode, PDF page selection. Native Integration: TaskCreate/TaskUpdate, hybrid plan mode, state persistence. Project Lifecycle: .octo/ state management. 95% probe success, cost transparency, validation gates. 29 personas, 30 commands, 42 skills. Run /octo:setup.
